list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large solid piece of hard material, especially rock, stone, or wood, typically with flat surfaces on each side.
a large quantity or allocation of things regarded as a unit.
an obstacle to the normal progress or functioning of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: substantial demands for time off may constitute a block to career advancement
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhu cầu đáng kể cho thời gian nghỉ có thể tạo thành một khối để thăng tiến nghề nghiệp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flat area of something, especially a solid area of color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cover the eyelid with a neutral block of color
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bao phủ mí mắt với một khối màu trung tính

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pulley or system of pulleys mounted in a case.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một khối ròng rọc đơn giản

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “I'll knock your block off,” he said
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Tôi sẽ đánh bật khối của bạn," anh nói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make the movement or flow in (a passage, pipe, road, etc.) difficult or impossible.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: block up the holes with sticky tape
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chặn các lỗ bằng băng dính

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: impress text or a design on (a book cover).
shape or reshape (a hat) using a wooden mold.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: nobody cleans and blocks old felt hats any more
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: không ai làm sạch và chặn mũ cũ cảm thấy nữa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: design or plan the movements of actors on a stage or movie set.
